name: goreleaser
description: Installs goreleaser and supporting files from GitHub release tarball and adds it to the global PATH.

version.description: The specific version to install; default value is 'latest' which will install the most recent available release of goreleaser. NOTE: If a version is provided and a matching release can not be found the feature will fail.

installFromGitHubRelease.description: When true, force pulling releases directly from published GitHub tarball regardless of the default installation method.

pro.description: If true, install goreleaser pro binaries. NOTE: A license key will be required to use the pro version.
